title: Global PND and car navigation market size forecast 2005 to 2015
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market size in thousand units, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 2014 to 2009.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2005.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2008.
gold: The statistic illustrates a market size forecast of the worldwide portable navigation device ( PND ) and car navigation market from 2005 to 2015 . The global PND and car navigation market size is projected to be 51 million units in 2015 .
